data.title: Company Profile
data.meta_description: Wells Fargo - Commercial bank. Public Company. Raised funding over 2 rounds from 4 investors. Founded by Henry Wells and William G Fargo in the year 1852. Wells Fargo has 7461 competitors.

Wells Fargo - About the company

What does Wells Fargo do?

Wells Fargo is a diversified banking and financial services firm. The company offers products & services across retail banking, business and corporate banking, investments, insurance among others. In 2022, the company recorded annual revenues of $108.93B and a net profit of $14.5B.

Which sectors and market segments does Wells Fargo operate in?

Wells Fargo serves in the B2C, B2B space in the Financial Services market segments.

The primary business model of Wells Fargo is :Financial Services > Banks > ***** **** > ***** ******

Wells Fargo got listed on New York Stock Exchange ( NYSE ) on Dec 10, 1962.

Wells Fargo's funding and investors

How much funding has Wells Fargo raised till date?

Wells Fargo has raised funding over 2 round s. Its first funding round was on Nov 05, 2018.

Who are Wells Fargo's investors?

Wells Fargo has 4 institutional investor s including Berkshire Hathaway, Appaloosa Management and Atalanta Sosnoff.

View details of Wells Fargo funding rounds and investors

Wells Fargo's founders and board of directors

Founder? Claim Profile

Who are the founders of Wells Fargo?

The founders of Wells Fargo are Henry Wells and William G Fargo.

Who is the current CEO of Wells Fargo?

Charles W Scharf, Fiona Gallagher, Julien Pajot, Charlie Scharf, Jonathan Weiss and Charlie Scharf are the CEO of Wells Fargo .

How many employees does Wells Fargo have?

Wells Fargo has 204,223 employees as of Dec 22. The total employee count is 13.3% lower than what it was in Dec 21.

Wells Fargo's Competitors and alternates

Competitive landscape of Wells Fargo

Wells Fargo ranks 36 th among 7461 competitors which include Truist, First Republic Bank and UniCredit. 196 of its competitors are funded while 1326 have exited. Overall, Wells Fargo and its competitors have raised over $16.8B in funding across 678 funding rounds involving 121 investors. There are 475 public and 851 acquired companies in the entire competition set.

Frequently asked questions about Wells Fargo

When was Wells Fargo founded?

Wells Fargo was founded in 1852

Where is Wells Fargo located?

Wells Fargo is located in San Francisco, United States.

Is Wells Fargo a public company?

Wells Fargo is a public company, it went public on Dec 10, 1962.

When was the latest funding round of Wells Fargo?

Wells Fargo's latest funding round was on Jan 01, 2019

What is the annual revenue of Wells Fargo?

Annual revenue of Wells Fargo is $76.7K as on Oct 31, 2023
